findings.title: Anyone can provide liquidity (in contrast to specification)
findings.description: Anyone can send eRowan or USDT directly to the contract and then use `gulp()` to absorb the tokens into the balance. This may not have a direct impact but circumvents the desired behavior as specified.

findings.title: Zero fees cause unnecessary calculations
findings.description: `SWAP_FEE` and `EXIT_FEE` are hardcoded to 0 but still used for calculations, resulting in unnecessary operations and duplicate functionality in `getSpotPriceSansFee()` and `getSpotPrice()`.

findings.title: Unnecessary factory address
findings.description: The `_factory` address in `BPool.sol` is unnecessary since the original `BFactory` contract from the Balancer codebase has been removed.
